Methods for coercing an object to a class

Source: R/coerce-methods.R
coerce.Rd

Methods for coercing an object to a class

Value

Object of new class.

See also

  • methods::as().

  • methods::canCoerce().

Other S4 Object: bcbioRNASeq, extract, show, updateObject

Examples

# DESeqDataSet ====
x <- as(bcb_small, "DESeqDataSet")
#> Coercing bcbioRNASeq to DESeqDataSet with DESeq2 1.24.0
#> converting counts to integer mode
names(S4Vectors::mcols(x))
#> [1] "broadClass"     "description"    "entrezID"       "geneBiotype"   
#> [5] "geneID"         "geneName"       "seqCoordSystem"
class(x)
#> [1] "DESeqDataSet"
#> attr(,"package")
#> [1] "DESeq2"
show(x)
#> class: DESeqDataSet 
#> dim: 500 6 
#> metadata(30): version level ... devtoolsSessionInfo subset
#> assays(5): counts tpm length normalized vst
#> rownames(500): ENSMUSG00000000088 ENSMUSG00000000326 ...
#>   ENSMUSG00000114367 ENSMUSG00000114458
#> rowData names(7): broadClass description ... geneName seqCoordSystem
#> colnames(6): control_rep1 control_rep2 ... fa_day7_rep2 fa_day7_rep3
#> colData names(26): sampleName day ... x5x3Bias xGC

# RangedSummarizedExperiment ====
x <- as(bcb_small, "RangedSummarizedExperiment")
slotNames(x)
#> [1] "rowRanges"       "colData"         "assays"          "NAMES"          
#> [5] "elementMetadata" "metadata"       
show(x)
#> class: RangedSummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 500 6 
#> metadata(30): version level ... devtoolsSessionInfo subset
#> assays(5): counts tpm length normalized vst
#> rownames(500): ENSMUSG00000000088 ENSMUSG00000000326 ...
#>   ENSMUSG00000114367 ENSMUSG00000114458
#> rowData names(7): broadClass description ... geneName seqCoordSystem
#> colnames(6): control_rep1 control_rep2 ... fa_day7_rep2 fa_day7_rep3
#> colData names(26): sampleName day ... x5x3Bias xGC

# SummarizedExperiment ====
# Coerce to RangedSummarizedExperiment first.
x <- as(bcb_small, "RangedSummarizedExperiment")
x <- as(x, "SummarizedExperiment")
class(x)
#> [1] "SummarizedExperiment"
#> attr(,"package")
#> [1] "SummarizedExperiment"
slotNames(x)
#> [1] "colData"         "assays"          "NAMES"           "elementMetadata"
#> [5] "metadata"       
show(x)
#> class: SummarizedExperiment 
#> dim: 500 6 
#> metadata(30): version level ... devtoolsSessionInfo subset
#> assays(5): counts tpm length normalized vst
#> rownames(500): ENSMUSG00000000088 ENSMUSG00000000326 ...
#>   ENSMUSG00000114367 ENSMUSG00000114458
#> rowData names(7): broadClass description ... geneName seqCoordSystem
#> colnames(6): control_rep1 control_rep2 ... fa_day7_rep2 fa_day7_rep3
#> colData names(26): sampleName day ... x5x3Bias xGC
